summary: Migrated template engine of web app from Dust.js to Glimmer.js.
Worked extensively in EmberJS app with JAVA to improve current features and add new features.
Developed various solutions implementing concept of Service Workers and PWA.
Devised various Chrome Extension for internal usage to improve and streamline work and processes.
Strategize, estimate and develop new features from scratch.
Migrated live web app from Angular to React with no downtime.
Integrated Kendo UI and Fluent UI with React.
Refine back-end of Angular based web app with micro-service architecture in C#.
Built and improved CI/CD pipelines for seamless deployments of Webapp and NuGet packages.
Worked extensively on improving and adding new features and pages with cross browser compatibility to Angular based web app.
Refined and implemented micro-service architecture for the app.
Worked on developing extension for Azure DevOps and VS Code.
Unit testing and end-to-end testing, with Jasmine, protractor and selenium.
Created a time critical and high impact Angular based web app (SPA) from scratch.
